abstract: A California federal judge has delayed the sentencing of Philip Horn, a Wells Fargo broker who pleaded guilty to defrauding more than a dozen clients.
snippet: A California federal judge has delayed the sentencing of Philip Horn, a Wells Fargo broker who pleaded guilty to defrauding more than a dozen clients.
lead_paragraph: A California federal judge has delayed the sentencing of Philip Horn, a Wells Fargo broker who pleaded guilty to defrauding more than a dozen clients.

headline.main: Judge Postpones Sentencing for Wells Fargo Broker

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Jessica Silver-Greenberg
